class X509Certificate

Detailed Description

Encryption and decryption. 

 //Generate key.
 gaia::security::KeyAttribute ka(gaia::security::AlgoType_RSA, 1024);
 gaia::security::KeyFactory kf(ka);
 EVP_PKEY* key;
 key = kf.generateKeyPair();
 //construct public key instance
 gaia::security::PublicKey pubKey(key);
 unsigned char* pInputString = (unsigned char*)"abcde";
 unsigned char* pEncryptedString = pubKey.encryptData(pInputString);
 
 //suppose pEncrypted is the encrypted string by private key.
 publicKey.publicDecrypt(pEncrypted);
